00208 /*  HELPERS  */

00210 
00212 static inline void aa_endconv_reverse( void * dst , void *src, size_t len ) {
00213     size_t i;
00214     for( i = 0; i < len; i ++ ) {
00215         size_t j = len - i - 1;
00216         uint8_t s = ((uint8_t*)src)[j];
00217         //printf("reversing: src[%d] -> dst[%d]: %x\n", j, i, s );
00218         ((uint8_t*)dst)[i] = s;
00219     }
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00224 static inline void aa_endconv_st_le( void *dst, void *src, size_t len ) {
00225 #if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00226     memcpy( dst, src, len );
00227 #elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00228     aa_endconv_reverse( dst, src, len );
00229 #else
00230 #error "Unknown Endian Convention"
00231 #endif
00232 }
00233 
00235 static inline void aa_endconv_st_be( void *dst, void *src, size_t len ) {
00236 #if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00237     aa_endconv_reverse( dst, src, len );
00238 #elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00239     memcpy( dst, src, len );
00240 #else
00241 #error "Unknown Endian Convention"
00242 #endif
00243 }
00244

00247 /*****************/

00249 
00250 // typing is work, so let's make some macros to do our function defs
00251 
00252 // this should probably be unrolled by a smart optimizer
00254 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_REVERSE( type, suffix )                 \
00255     static inline type aa_endconv_reverse_##suffix( type x ) {  \
00256         type y = 0;                                             \
00257         type v;                                                 \
00258         type j;                                                 \
00259         size_t i;                                               \
00260         for( i = 0  ; i < 8*sizeof(type); i+=8 ) {              \
00261             j = (type) (8*sizeof(type) - i - 8);                \
00262             v = (type) (((x >> i) & 0xff) << j);                \
00263             y |= v;                                             \
00264         }                                                       \
00265         return y;                                               \
00266     };
00267 
00268 
00269 // definer macros for aa_endconv_h_to_{l,b}e functions
00270 #if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00271 
00273 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_H_TO_LE( type, suffix )                         \
00274     static inline type aa_endconv_h_to_le_##suffix( type v ) {  return v; }
00275 
00276 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_H_TO_BE( type, suffix )                 \
00277     static inline type aa_endconv_h_to_be_##suffix( type v ) {  \
00278         return aa_endconv_reverse_##suffix( v );                \
00279     };
00280 
00282 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_LE_TO_H( type, suffix )                         \
00283     static inline type aa_endconv_le_to_h_##suffix( type v ) {  return v; }
00284 
00285 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_BE_TO_H( type, suffix )                 \
00286     static inline type aa_endconv_be_to_h_##suffix( type v ) {  \
00287         return aa_endconv_reverse_##suffix( v );                \
00288     };
00289 
00290 #elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00291 
00292 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_H_TO_LE( type, suffix )                 \
00293     static inline type aa_endconv_h_to_le_##suffix( type v ) {  \
00294         return aa_endconv_reverse_##suffix( v );                \
00295     };
00296 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_H_TO_BE( type, suffix )                         \
00297     static inline type aa_endconv_h_to_le_##suffix( type v ) {  return v; }
00298 
00299 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_LE_TO_H( type, suffix )                 \
00300     static inline type aa_endconv_le_to_h_##suffix( type v ) {  \
00301         return aa_endconv_reverse_##suffix( v );                \
00302     };
00303 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_BE_TO_H( type, suffix )                         \
00304     static inline type aa_endconv_be_to_h_##suffix( type v ) {  return v; }
00305 
00306 #else
00307 #error "Unknown Endian Convention"
00308 #endif
00309 
00311 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_LDST_DEF(type,suffix)                           \
00312     static inline void aa_endconv_st_le_##suffix( void *dst, type src ) { \
00313         aa_endconv_st_le( dst, &src, sizeof(type) ); }                  \
00314     static inline void aa_endconv_st_be_##suffix( void *dst, type src ) { \
00315         aa_endconv_st_be( dst, &src, sizeof(type) ); }                  \
00316     static inline type aa_endconv_ld_le_##suffix( void *src ) {         \
00317         type r;                                                         \
00318         aa_endconv_st_le( &r, src, sizeof(type) );                      \
00319         return r;}                                                      \
00320     static inline type aa_endconv_ld_be_##suffix( void *src ) {         \
00321         type r;                                                         \
00322         aa_endconv_st_be( &r, src, sizeof(type) );                      \
00323         return r; }                                                     \
00324 
00325 #define AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_CONV_DEF(type,suffix)   \
00326     AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_REVERSE( type, suffix )     \
00327     AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_H_TO_LE( type, suffix )     \
00328     AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_H_TO_BE( type, suffix )     \
00329     AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_LE_TO_H( type, suffix )     \
00330     AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_BE_TO_H( type, suffix )     \
00331 
00332 
00334 AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_LDST_DEF( int16_t,  i16 );
00336 AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_CONV_DEF( int16_t,  i16 );
00338 AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_LDST_DEF( uint16_t, u16 );
00340 AA_ENDCONV_MAKE_CONV_DEF( uint16_t, u16 );
